title: It’s taken 15 years! – Ross Emerson says he no-balled Muralitharan because he was ordered!
content: Ross Emerson has spilled the beans. It’s taken 15 years but at least now we know an injustice took place and an apology is a must. That apology must go to the man who suffered much trauma and he is none other than Muttiah Muralitharan. How many cricketers themselves heckled and jeered at him throughout,…
